string.name: greetings
string.b: Hello and welcome \n to CLICKER GAME!

resources.string:
After tapping START
 the 30 seconds countdown will start.
 More taps on TAP - better results.
 Good luck have fun.
Zero, hmm, did you really fall asleep instead of playing?
Your speed of tapping is at granny level. Poor.
Not so cool. You can better!
People are divided into 2 types: -200 and 200+. You know who daddy now.
Only units to reaches this level, my respect. Boast to somebody.
Your fingers like lightning! Very fast!
Really? I hope that no one will reach 1K, because its to difficult to invent new strings XD.
